name: Fritzfon smarthome image
info:
Show power, energy and temperature on a fritzfon

#  Need to be "http in" (Get) node originated
- msg.info (string)   
- msg.valueXX (number for all features or string)   
(1. X=iconNumber 2. X=valueNumber)   

## Override "Input unit" per data   
msg.unitXX (string)   
example: msg.unit11 = "kWh"

## Override "out unit" per data   
msg.outUnitXX (string)   
example: msg.outUnit11 = "kWh"   

## Override label   
msg.labelX (string)   
example: msg.label1 = "TV"

## Override headline   
msg.headlineX (string)   
example: msg.headline2 = "TV"

## color circle   
msg.circleX   
available colors:   
blue, green, grey, orange, red, white and yellow   
example: msg.circle1 = "green"   

## mini icons
msg.miniIconX (string)   
available icons:   
"battery", "batteryX", "batteryFlash", "happy", "sceptic", "sad", "warn", "signal", "signalNoConnection", "signal0" to "signal4"   

msg.miniIconXPercent (number 0-100)   
"battery", "batteryX", "batteryFlash"  or "signal" icon   

msg.miniIconXDBm (number -100-0)   
"signal" icon   

msg.miniIconXColor (string)   
available colors:   
red, orange, yellow, greenYellow and green   
"battery", "batteryX" or "batteryFlash" icon   
# Rounding
## Round modes:
Round = no unnecessary zeros.  
To fixed = add zeros to fit selected decemals.
## Override round mode 
msg.roundModeXX (string)   
"", "Round" or "To fixed"
example: msg.roundMode11 = "To fixed"   
## Override round decimals
msg.decimalsXX   
example: msg.decimals11 = 2

meta.author: Tim Oberle
meta.desc: Show power, energy and temperature on a fritzfon

name: iconNumber
Label

selectedJimpFunction.name: blit
selectedJimpFunction.description: blit the image with another Jimp image at x, y, optionally cropped

parameters.name: x
parameters.hint: the x position to blit the image

parameters.name: y
parameters.hint: the y position to blit the image

parameters.name: srcx
parameters.hint: the x position from which to crop the source image

parameters.name: srcy
parameters.hint: the y position from which to crop the source image

parameters.name: srcw
parameters.hint: the width to which to crop the source image

parameters.name: srch
parameters.hint: the height to which to crop the source image

parameters.name: font|str
parameters.hint: font to print. NOTE: This can be one of the presets or the path to a fnt file
